TopicTitle: Is there way to fire railguns and missles with a single stage craft????

Articles.Content:
Is there way to fire railguns and missles with a single stage craft????

ive seen Videos on youtube of people with planes firing railguns and missles without droping a stage, how dey do it?
I\'m not quite sure what you mean by 'dropping a stage,' but most people build an airplane, and fire from that.
You can add stages (in this case, railgun decouplings) in the VAB. Mouse over a stage and click the + sign.

Guys, what I think he means is decoupling and firing a missile in a single stage.

That\'s easy, just drag the missile\'s SRB and the decoupler into one stage.

Doesn\'t work like that. (At least in 0.13.1)

Last time I tried, it did.
As I understand, if you just put the decoupler and the engine in one stage this wouldn\'t work. I just turn on the engine and then I jettison the rocket.

As I understand, if you just put the decoupler and the engine in one stage this wouldn\'t work. I just turn on the engine and then I jettison the rocket.

It works for some engines; you can modify an engine to work like this by pasting 

ActivatesEvenIfDisconnected = True

into it\'s .cfg file.
